directions.step:
Drain oysters. Lay an oyster across 1/2 slice bacon. Sprinkle each oyster with seasonings and parsley. Roll entire strip of bacon around oyster and fasten with toothpicks. Place oyster on a rack in a shallow baking dish. Bake in 450 degree oven for 10 minutes, or until bacon is crisp. Remove toothpicks and serve.
From: Rare Collections, by the Junior League of Galveston
